Package com.flipkart.business

Class FlipFitUserService

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.business.FlipFitUserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitUserInterface
public class FlipFitUserService extends Object implements FlipFitUserInterface
Service class responsible for handling user-related operations like registration, login, logout, and password change. Interacts with the FlipFitUserDAO for database operations.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public FlipFitUser registerUser(int id, String email, String password, String name, String contact, int roleId)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Specified by:
      registerUser in interface FlipFitUserInterface
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the user
      email - The email address of the user
      password - The password for the user
      name - The full name of the user
      contact - The contact number of the user
      roleId - The role ID of the user (e.g., customer, gym owner, etc.)
      Returns:
      The registered FlipFitUser object

    • loginUser

      public FlipFitUser loginUser(String email, String password)
      Logs in an existing user using email and password.
      Specified by:
      loginUser in interface FlipFitUserInterface
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user attempting to log in
      password - The password of the user
      Returns:
      The logged-in FlipFitUser object if successful, null otherwise

      Logs out a user from the system.
      Specified by:

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String email, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password for a user.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface FlipFitUserInterface
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user requesting the password change
      oldPassword - The current password of the user
      newPassword - The new password for the user
      Returns:
      true if the password change was successful, false otherwise
